description: Number of distinct 3-colorings (X, O and blank) of 3 by 3 grid with floor((n+1)/2) X's, floor(n/2) O's and 9 - n blanks.
comments: Number of tic-tac-toe positions after n plays if game is allowed to continue after the win, up to rotation and reflection. Gives upper bound on distinct tic-tac-toe positions after n plays (A008907).
links: Index entries for sequences related to tic-tac-toe
author: _Rob Pratt_
